DOC.brief_summary: To investigate effect different dos cisatracurium pretreatment succinylcholine-induced fasciculation .
DOC.detailed_description: Ninety patient schedule laparoscopic cholecystectomy equally randomize three group receive pretreatment 0.005 , 0.01 , 0.02 mg/kg cisatracurium , respectively . General anesthesia induce 3.5 min later , train four stimulation monitor 4.5 min later , succinylcholine 1.5 mg/kg inject 5 min later , endotracheal intubation implement 6.5 min later . The side effect cisatracurium , intensity fasciculation , intubate condition , time extent maximal depression twitch time recovery 20 % control value , severity myalgia 24 h postoperatively , serum potassium cisatracurium pretreatments , intubate time , 5 min intubation record .
DOC.criteria: American Standards Association ( ASA ) physical status I II patient schedule elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy tracheal intubation require general anesthesia ; 20 65 year old ; Without acidbase imbalance electrolyte disturbance ; With normal hepatic renal function . Patients contraindication associated succinylcholine cisatracurium ; Patients take drug know alter action neuromuscular blocker ; Patients body mass index exceed 30
